channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: For Christopher King, Nothing But The Very Best Will Do
item.description: In every Christopher King bag there are lessons about quality and about pride in one’s work. This founder is someone who puts excellence into every on...

item.title: Markiplier’s ‘Iron Lung’ Rotten Tomatoes Scores Are Near Perfect, So Far
item.description: Markiplier releases his promising Iron Lung horror movies on 2,500 screens this weekend, and its Rotten Tomatoes scores are great so far.

item.title: The ‘Bridgerton’ Season 4 Part 2 Release Date Is Another Disappointment
item.description: The Bridgerton season 4 part 2 release date is awkwardly far away, continuing a disappointing Netflix tradition that they insist on keeping.

item.title: Some Think New ‘Crimson Desert’ Previews Are ‘Too Good To Be True’
item.description: Crimson Desert is out this spring and so far, looks great, though some are skeptical based on the developer's past.

item.title: NYT Connections Hints Today: Saturday, January 31 Clues And Answers (#965)
item.description: Looking for today's NYT Connections hints? Some help and the answers for today's game are right here to help keep your streak alive.

item.title: AI ads are neither

item.title: Skepticism, surprise and resistance
item.description: Every important medical innovation of the last five hundred years has been ridiculed, undermined and ignored by doctors and the medical establishment....

item.title: On the hiring line

item.title: Insulation > power
item.description: When energy is cheap, people build buildings that are poorly insulated. It’s faster and cheaper in the short run. In the long run, though, insulation ...

item.title: Terrible
item.description: Most of us are terrible at some things. Lack of skill, focus, practice, care or just temperament means that we don’t do the task as well as we might. ...
